wlv.mt.xmlwrap
Class CMU_XMLWrapper

java.lang.Object
  wlv.mt.xmlwrap.CMU_XMLWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLWrapper
public class CMU_XMLWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLWrapper

This class produces an XML file from the output of the CMU machine translation system It also produces a series of text files from the nbest list (one file per sentence), which will be used in computing the glass box features that rely on ngrams computed on the nbest list
